message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $100. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. It's still a bit higher than what I was hoping to pay, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our initial offer and your counteroffer. How about we try $90? It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to meet us in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. It's the price I'm willing to pay for the product.
